div.bibl: Dansk Tidende (Danish Times), Dec. 11, 1925. SPORT EVENT

body.p: Four of our athletes participated in the Tribune Cross Country Race last Sunday. Robert Nussle came in as No. 20 for which he received a silver medal; Anders Schelde, No. 24, bronze medal; Niels Nielsen who is 40 was No. 50.
At the A.A.W Marathon race Niels Nielsen was No. 9 and received a gold medal.
The football match scheduled for last Sunday was postponed on account of unfavorable weather.
Next Sunday afternoon our team will meet a Norwegian team. We hope the Norwegians do not get cold feet.
